item.title: New Class Suggestion (Mithras a cult class!)
item.dc:creator: Icibalus
item.description:
Mithras’s purpose is to be the Cult’s god, their idol.
Having an omniscient kill that targets only Paladins is very swingy. Plus, it’s just kind of a ‘click this button once the Paladin claims’ thing.
Rage bumps Cult’s Kill power to be even more ridiculous than it already is. 2KPN with a potential 3KPN from bleeding is just about as much as I’m able to deal with. Also, being converted after death will make a lot of people very salty.

There’s also the conceptual problem of the fact that the dead should stay dead in my opinion.
Sorry, this class probably won’t work.

item.title: New Class Suggestion (Mithras a cult class!)
item.dc:creator: Htm
item.description:
Mithras, Cult, Special

Mithras class is unique

Passive: Dark Friendship: talk to the cult at night

Passive: Undead: Cant vote, be killed, be visited, or look alive to other players, will also die in 3 days

Day Ability: Gaze: gaze into a player’s eye causing them to be unable to use their day abilities

Day Ability: Pally Stop: Stop the paladin from using his night abilities in the next night, use it on someone who isn’t paladin and nothing will happen to him, 1 use only!

Night Ability: Bite: 1 use only! bite into a player’s arm causing them to bleed.

Night Ability: Power of Mithras: control a player to visit another player, goes through target change immunity they also will not be informed of this

Ritualist now has a day ability making him able to make the Mithras poss a dead Cult but in order to do this he has to sacrifice himself, this ability is called Forming Demons, this ability can only be used once if a Ritualist has already done this the other Ritualist will not be able to use it for the rest of the game

Lore:
The Ritualist will now help the Mithras be free by sacrificing himself to make the Mithras come to the throne of lies world! (Yeah I’m kinda terrible at making lore)

Comments
I think it’s a bit strange to talk about the Mithras but not adding him in the game as a class maybe adding this will make a lil more sense or possibly adding something different that is still called the Mithras and part of the cult, also when the Mithras posses a player the player will still be that player he will just transform into a bot or something

Suggestions/Feedback would be appreciated
